ElementDescription: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject
Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project
Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY
Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging.
Notes: Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.

ElementDescription: Sex of subject at birth
Notes: M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

ElementDescription: Staff code number of person completing this form
1. Has anyone ever tried to take something directly from you by using force or the threat of force, such as a stick-up or mugging?
a. Number of times anyone ever tried to take something directly from you by using force or the threat of force, such as a stick-up or mugging?
b. Approximate age(s) at which anyone ever tried to take something directly from you by using force or the threat of force, such as a stick-up or mugging?
2. Has anyone ever attempted to rob you or actually robbed you (i.e., stolen your personal belongings)?
a. Number of times anyone ever attempted to rob you or actually robbed you (i.e., stolen your personal belongings)?
b. Approximate age(s) at which anyone ever attempted to rob you or actually robbed you (i.e., stolen your personal belongings)?
3. Has anyone ever attempted to or succeeded in breaking into your home when you were not there?
a. Number of times anyone ever attempted to or succeeded in breaking into your home when you were not there?
b. Approximate age(s) at which anyone ever attempted to or succeeded in breaking into your home when you were not there?
4. Has anyone ever attempted to or succeeded in breaking into your home when you were there?
a. Number of times anyone ever attempted to or succeeded in breaking into your home when you were there?
b. Approximate age(s) at which anyone ever attempted to or succeeded in breaking into your home when you were there?
5. Have you ever had a serious accident at work, in a car, or somewhere else
a. Number of times you ever had a serious accident at work, in a car, or somewhere else (If yes, please specify below)
b. Approximate age(s) at which you ever had a serious accident at work, in a car, or somewhere else
6. Have you ever experienced a natural disaster such as a tornado, hurricane, flood or major earthquake, etc., where you felt you or your loved ones were in danger of death or injury?
a. Number of times you ever experienced a natural disaster such as a tornado, hurricane, flood or major earthquake, etc., where you felt you or your loved ones were in danger of death or injury?
b. Approximate age(s) you ever experienced a natural disaster such as a tornado, hurricane, flood or major earthquake, etc., where you felt you or your loved ones were in danger of death or injury?
7. Have you ever experienced a "man-made" disaster such as a train crash, building collapse, bank robbery, fire, etc., where you felt you or your loved ones were in danger of death or injury?

a. Number of times you ever experienced a "man-made" disaster such as a train crash, building collapse, bank robbery, fire, etc., where you felt you or your loved ones were in danger of death or injury?

b. Approximate age(s) you ever experienced a "man-made" disaster such as a train crash, building collapse, bank robbery, fire, etc., where you felt you or your loved ones were in danger of death or injury?
8. Have you ever been exposed to dangerous chemicals or radioactivity that might threaten your health?
a. Number of times exposed to dangerous chemicals or radioactivity that might threaten your health?
b. Approximate age(s) exposed to dangerous chemicals or radioactivity that might threaten your health?
9. Have you ever been in any other situation in which you were seriously injured?
a. Number of times in any other situation in which you were seriously injured?
b. Approximate age(s) at which you were in any other situation in which you were seriously injured?
10. Have you ever been in any other situation in which you feared you might be killed or seriously injured
a. Number of times in any other situation in which you feared you might be killed or seriously injured
b. Approximate age(s) at which you were in any other situation in which you feared you might be killed or seriously injured
11. Have you ever seen someone seriously injured or killed?
a. Number of times you have seen someone seriously injured or killed?
b. Approximate age(s) at which you have seen someone seriously injured or killed?
12. Have you ever seen dead bodies (other than at a funeral) or had to handle dead bodies for any reason?
a. Number of times you have ever seen dead bodies (other than at a funeral) or had to handle dead bodies for any reason?
b. Approximate age(s) at which you have ever seen dead bodies (other than at a funeral) or had to handle dead bodies for any reason?
13. Have you ever had a close friend or family member murdered, or killed by a drunk driver?
a. Number of times you ever had a close friend or family member murdered, or killed by a drunk driver?
b. Approximate age(s) at which you ever had a close friend or family member murdered, or killed by a drunk driver?
14. Have you ever had a spouse, romantic partner, or child die?
a. Number of times you ever had a spouse, romantic partner, or child die?
b. Approximate age(s) at which you ever had a spouse, romantic partner, or child die?
15. Have you ever had a serious or life-threatening illness? (If yes, please specify relationship below)
a. Number of times you ever had a serious or life-threatening illness?
b. Approximate age(s) at which you ever had a serious or life-threatening illness?
16. Have you ever received news of a serious injury, life-threatening illness, or unexpected death of someone close to you?
a. Number of times you ever received news of a serious injury, life-threatening illness, or unexpected death of someone close to you?
b. Approximate age(s) you ever received news of a serious injury, life-threatening illness, or unexpected death of someone close to you?
17. Have you ever had to engage in combat while in military service in an official or unofficial war zone?
a. Number of times you ever had to engage in combat while in military service in an official or unofficial war zone?
b. Approximate age(s) at which you ever had to engage in combat while in military service in an official or unofficial war zone
18. Has anyone ever made you have intercourse or oral or anal sex against your will?
a. Repeated intercourse or oral or anal sex against your will?
b. Approximate age(s) of intercourse or oral or anal sex against your will??
c. Frequency of intercourse or oral or anal sex against your will??

19. Has anyone ever touched private parts of your body, or made you touch theirs, under force or threat? (If yes, please indicate nature of relationship with person [e.g., stranger, friend, relative, parent, sibling] below)
a. Repeated: anyone touching private parts of your body, or made you touch theirs, under force or threat?
b. Approximate age(s) at which anyone touched private parts of your body, or made you touch theirs, under force or threat?
c. Frequency with which anyone touched private parts of your body, or made you touch theirs, under force or threat?
20. Other than forced sex or forced touching of private parts, have there been any other situations in which another person tried to force you to have an unwanted sexual contact?
a. Repeated: (Other than forced sex or forced touching of private parts) any other situations in which another person tried to force you to have an unwanted sexual contact
b. Approximate age(s): (Other than forced sex or forced touching of private parts) any other situations in which another person tried to force you to have an unwanted sexual contact
c. Frequency: (Other than forced sex or forced touching of private parts) any other situations in which another person tried to force you to have an unwanted sexual contact
21. Has anyone, including family members or friends, ever attacked you with a gun, knife or some other weapon?
a. Repeated: anyone, including family members or friends, ever attacked you with a gun, knife or some other weapon
b. Approximate age(s) at which anyone, including family members or friends, ever attacked you with a gun, knife or some other weapon
c. Frequency with which anyone, including family members or friends, ever attacked you with a gun, knife or some other weapon
22. Has anyone, including family members or friends, ever attacked you without a weapon and seriously injured you?
a. Repeated: anyone, including family members or friends, ever attacked you without a weapon and seriously injured you
b. Approximate age(s) at which anyone, including family members or friends, ever attacked you without a weapon and seriously injured you?
c. Frequency with which anyone, including family members or friends, ever attacked you without a weapon and seriously injured you?
23. Has anyone in your family ever beaten, spanked, or pushed you hard enough to cause injury?
a. Repeated:  anyone in your family ever beat, spanked, or pushed you hard enough to cause injury?
b. Approximate age(s) at which anyone in your family ever beat, spanked, or pushed you hard enough to cause injury?
c. Frequency with which anyone in your family ever beat, spanked, or pushed you hard enough to cause injury?
24. Have you experienced any other extraordinarily stressful situation or event that is not covered already?
a. Repeated: you experienced any other extraordinarily stressful situation or event that is not covered already?
b. Approximate age(s) at which you experienced any other extraordinarily stressful situation or event that is not covered already?
c. Frequency with which you experienced any other extraordinarily stressful situation or event that is not covered already?
